products.title: Bella Blackout Tango Orange Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This bright bold orange perfect fit roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure perfect fit blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.
